amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to reduce amounts authorized for defense spending in FY22 to no more than the amount requested by the President.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce amounts authorized for defense spending in FY22 to no more than the amount requested by the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jacobs (CA) amendment (A024) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 142 - 286 (Roll no. 285).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A024) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Ms. Jacobs (CA).
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Jacobs (CA) amendment (A024) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 142 - 286 (Roll no. 285).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jacobs (CA) amendment (A024) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 142 - 286 (Roll no. 285).
